entry.title: Panka Pelishek (Wiki - Did u know)
entry.content: ... that the pianist Panka Pelishek (pictured) was a Heroine of Socialist Labor?

entry.title: a British school inspired by a circus tent (Wiki - Did u know)
entry.content: ... that while a British school inspired by a circus tent was described as "eclectic and witty", its "plain functional" replacement won an RIBA Award?

entry.title: Triệu Quân Sự (Wiki - Did u know)
entry.content: ... that Vietnamese prisoner Triệu Quân Sự escaped from jail four times, and was twice caught while playing online games at internet cafés?

entry.title: 29 BC Yellow River flood (Wiki - Did u know)
entry.content: ... that China's imperial chancellor killed himself after he was blamed for the devastation of the 29 BC Yellow River flood?

entry.title: Ruth El Saffar (Wiki - Did u know)
entry.content: ... that a hospitalized Ruth El Saffar had to dictate the introduction of her final book to Diana de Armas Wilson, with whom she had co-edited Quixotic Desire?

entry.title: a public service announcement about drunk driving (Wiki - Did u know)
entry.content: ... that a public service announcement about drunk driving was voted the best television advertisement in New Zealand?

entry.title: Denise Stoklos (Wiki - Did u know)
entry.content: ... that Denise Stoklos's "essential theatre" involves minimizing her acting methods while maximizing "the power of drama"?

entry.title: Donald Trump applies his own makeup (Wiki - Did u know)
entry.content: ... that Donald Trump applies his own makeup each day, according to his former press secretary?

entry.title: Spencer Reid (Wiki - Did u know)
entry.content: ... that where NFL player Spencer Reid is from, "There's no McDonald's. There's no nothing"?

</div>

<p class="hidden md:block bold lieu">{{ place }}</p>
{{ #hasTicket }} <a href="{{ ticket }}" target="_blank" class="md:hidden z-20 hover:text-primary"><i class="fal fa-ticket-alt text-2xl"></i></a> {{ /hasTicket }}
</div>
</div>

<p class="authors regular pt-2">{{ author }}</p>
</div>
